thread.title: We are green with envy over these red carpet gowns at the “Vanity Fair” Oscars after-party
thread.title_full: We are green with envy over these red carpet gowns at the “Vanity Fair” Oscars after-party

author: Bronwyn Isaac
title: We are green with envy over these red carpet gowns at the “Vanity Fair” Oscars after-party
text:
We are green with envy over these red carpet gowns at the “Vanity Fair” Oscars after-party For many of the top-billing actors and actresses in Hollywood, dressing up for the Oscars is the ultimate night of outfit coordination. So we couldn’t help but notice how many celebrities at the Vanity Fair Oscars after-party were wearing shades of green. We are all about ogling and assessing the outrageous red carpet looks that come with awards show season, but the after party is where we get to see people let their hair down and show off their true style.
This year some of our favorite actors proved that all that glitters is green , and we’re completely on board.
We have to admit, everyone looked like pure money in their green ensembles. 1. Brie Larson Karwai Tang / Getty Images 2. Mariah Carey Philip Rock / Getty Images 3. Kate Bosworth Philip Rock / Anadolu Agency /Getty Images 4. Jemima Goldsmith 
Phillip Rock / Getty Images 
5. Liz Goldwyn Gregg DeGuire / Getty Images 6. imone Smith Philip Rock / Getty Images It’s not easy being green, but it sure looks good on our favorite celebrities! Hopefully next year we’ll see even more stars trying a glamorous take on this earthy color. We think they can pull it off. Now we feel inspired to dig around in our closets for our favorite green number.
